```{r}
rural <- get_decennial(geography = "state",
                       variables = c("P001001", "P002005"),
                       year = 2010,
                       output = "wide",
                       geometry = TRUE) %>%
  rename(state = NAME) %>%
  mutate(prop_rural = P002005/P001001,
         state = reorder(state, prop_rural))

glimpse(rural)
```
